text: Anna Adriana Burger (born 25 August 1967) is an international cricketer who made 18 One Day International appearances for South Africa national women's cricket team between 1997 and 2000. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Cricketers from Cape Town Category:South African women cricketers Category:South Africa women One Day International cricketers
title: Anina Burger
